title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 7.9 - Required records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 7.9 - Required records

State Regulations

Each approved school shall maintain a record, on a form or
forms prescribed by the commissioner, of all students who have completed the
approved course. Such records shall be available for one year for inspection by
the Department of Motor Vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
7.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
